overview: Lan Yu is a popular but arrogant star. One day, he accidentally meets Yu Zai, an ordinary girl. Moved by the girl's integrity and kindness Lan Yu is determined to change. Through hard work, he has transformed from a controversial star to a good actor with strength and dedication winning the respect of everyone inside and outside the industry. At the same time, he develops sincere feelings for Yu Zai.
title: The Shining Girl
